name: pca_analysis
description: Performs PCA analysis on methylation beta values from read_idat output. Filters sex chromosomes, selects top variable CpGs, and generates PCA plot.

parameters.name: top_CpG
parameters.description: Number of most variable CpGs to use for PCA

parameters.name: array
parameters.description: Array type for annotations (450k, EPIC, or EPICv2)
